thread.title: Roundtrip Flight: San Francisco or LA to Australia (Sydney or Melbourne) from $725
thread.title_full: Roundtrip Flight: San Francisco or LA to Australia (Sydney or Melbourne) from $725

author: serra
title: Roundtrip Flight: San Francisco or LA to Australia (Sydney or Melbourne) from $725
text: United Airlines offers Roundtrip Flights from San Francisco (SFO) or Los Angeles (LAX) to Sydney or Melbourne, Australia from $725 for select dates between May and November. Book on Expedia , Priceline , Orbitz or United Airlines . Thanks serra Note, these fares require a minimum 7-day stay. Travel availability (subject to change): Depart from Los Angeles (LAX) to Sydney (SYD) $740 (non-stop) Every Mon, Tue, Wed, Thurs from May 2 to June 6; then again Aug 1 to Sept 13; Nov 1, 6, 7, 8 Depart from Los Angeles (LAX) to Melbourne (MEL) $730 (non-stop) Mon, Tue, Wed, Thur from May 2-30; June 7 Depart from San Francisco (SFO) to Sydney (SYD) $725 (non-stop) Every Thur in May; Aug 9, 23, 26, 30; Sept 2, 7, 10, 13, 16, 17 Depart from San Francisco (SFO) to Melbourne (MEL) $730 (one stop) May 1; June 5, 6; Aug 1; Sept 4 Editor's Notes & Price Research
